patterns: I want to talk to you
intents.response: Hello! Welcome to ESTIN University Assistant! How can I help you today?
Hi there! I'm here to help with any questions about ESTIN University. What do you need to know?

patterns: Are you available to chat now
intents.response: I'm doing great, thank you! Ready to help you with ESTIN-related questions. What can I assist you with?
Goodbye! Feel free to come back if you have more questions about ESTIN!

patterns: What time is the library open

What is the earliest I can go to the library
intents.response: The library opens at 8:00 am

intents.response: The library closes at 11:00 pm

patterns: What is the price of tuition

intents.response: Annual tuition fees are 45,000 DZD for national students and 90,000 DZD for international students

intents.response: Scholarship applications are open from September 1st to September 30th. Contact the financial aid office for more details

patterns: How is the academic year divided

Information on the academic year timeline
Tell me about the academic calendar months
What are the periods in the academic year
What months are in the academic year
When does the academic year start and finish
What is the structure of the school year
intents.response: The academic year is divided into two semesters: Fall (September-January) and Spring (February-June)

intents.response: To request a transcript, visit the administration office with your student ID. Processing time is 3-5 days

intents.response: Cafeteria hours: 7:00 AM - 7:00 PM. Breakfast: 7-10 AM, Lunch: 11 AM-2 PM, Snacks: 2-7 PM
